query: I want a place that feels like a night market in Bangkok—noisy, plastic chairs, super casual—not a fancy sit-down spot
romantic dinner spot with ocean views for our anniversary
best fish tacos, nothing fancy, just good and cheap
somewhere trendy with creative cocktails and shareable plates
authentic local food, where the locals actually eat, not touristy
quiet breakfast spot with beautiful views
celebrity chef restaurant for a special occasion, willing to splurge
good sushi, late night, fun atmosphere
farm to table, sustainable, not too expensive
somewhere with live music and good happy hour
